pkgmetadata.longdescription: Interpolation and Extrapolation for Species Diversity // Provides simple functions to compute and plot two types (sample-size- and coverage-based) rarefaction and extrapolation of species diversity (Hill numbers) for individual-based (abundance) data or sampling-unit- based (incidence) data. (Hsieh, Ma and Chao 2014) doi: 10.1111/2041-210X.12613.
